HeroSection.headerPartOne: Proccess of getting into Top Unis can be
HeroSection.desc: It is about dedication and how you spend your time

AboutSection.desc: It is a service that provides an educational activities for people who want to get into best USA, Canada, Europe universities. Proven and qualitative educational materials are our hallmark. Feel free to explore!
AboutSection.qualityDesc: Guarantee of good quality of the transferred material, checked by our reliable Mentors
AboutSection.upToDateDesc: Rapidly developing application with systematic updates and news
AboutSection.ratingDesc: Letting user know what level they are currently at based on their performance
AboutSection.entertainmentDesc: Activities made not only to test yourself but to compete with your friends and have fun together

BenefitsSection.why: Why would you start your college
BenefitsSection.popularity: Top universities are renowned for their academic excellence and world-class faculty
BenefitsSection.media: Graduating from a prestigious university can enhance your professional reputation and open doors to various opportunities
BenefitsSection.job: Top universities have large and influential alumni networks
BenefitsSection.traveling: Top universities have strong connections with various industries and employers

ActivitiesSection.desc: Upon registration, students take a diagnostic test to assess their current knowledge and strengths and weaknesses in various subjects. Based on the diagnostic results, the platform generates a personalized study plan for each student. The study plan outlines a timeline, study materials, and practice exercises, focusing on areas that need improvement.

GamesSection.bonus: As a bonus for completing a
GamesSection.desc: After finishing a quiz you will be awarded with availability to sign in into our external games section. You will be able to play the games whose level of difficulty are adjusted to the score you achieved in the quiz.

Quiz.quizInfo: The quiz consists of 3 levels of difficulty and 10 questions for each level.
